subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Palaearctic (excluding Middle East, North Africa and Middle Asia) ( Alonso-Zarazaga 2011c )

Biology. Forests, shrublands, gardens. Adults occur in IV–IX. On Rosaceae :
Pyrus
sp.,
Malus
sp.,
Mespilus
sp.,
Crataegus
sp. ( Rosaceae ) ( Dieckmann 1974 ).
